Contributions and Extensions

Since HTTPBuilder is meant to be a general-purpose (and extensible) tool, it's not surprising that other users will create adaptations for specific tasks. What are other people doing with HTTPBuilder? Share your extensions!

OAuth for HTTPBuilder by Erem Boto
Simple class to support OAuth using the Scribe project. Spock test class.

CSS Selector
Naviagate a parsed HTML tree using CSS selectors rather than GPath.
